Agora Vote CONTINUE WITH FACEBOOK LOG IN SIGN UP Agora Logo User Name Password Login User Login User Sign Up First Name Last Name Email Address Already Have An Account ? Sign In Forgot Password ? Profile Dashboard Communicate Report a bug Share with others About Agora My Invitations Contact Us Agora vote is a voting platform where users can create elections and invite friends to cast their votes. It supports a wide range of voting algorithms some of which are Majority, Egalitarian, Australian STV just to name a few Feel free to contact us on our Gitter channels and work with us on Gitlab AOSSIE\'s GITTER AOSSIE\'s GITLAB Feel free to raise an issue so that our team can improve that as fast as possible Change Password New Password Confirm New Password Create Election Active \n Elections Pending \nElections Total \n Elections Finished \n Elections Invite Voters? Get real time results? How secret are ballots? Ballots are completely secret and never shown to anyone Ballots are visible only to me Ballots are visible to everyone with access to the election Who can see the list of voters? Only me Everyone with access to election Some More Options Next Add Candidate Name of Candidate Enter Candidate\'s Name Election Description Election Name Start Date(YYYY-MM-DD, HH:MM) End Date(YYYY-MM-DD, HH:MM) Enter Details datePicker Select Voting Algorithm Oklahoma RangeVoting RankedPairs Satisfaction Approval Voting SmithSet Sequential Proportional Approval Voting Approval Exhaustive ballot with dropoff Copeland UncoveredSet Borda MinimaxCondorcet Nanson Kemeny-Young RandomBallot Contingent InstantRunoff2Round Baldwin ExhaustiveBallot Logout testemail 0 user email id Send Link Developed with ❤️ by AOSSIE Please enter user name to receive password reset link Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco labor Candidates First Name Second Name Third Name Fourth Name START: Starting Date STATUS: Election Status END: Ending Date Image Button Description Active Elections Finished Elections Pending Elections Total Elections Election Name TODO TODO Share with others to make open source a more beautiful place delete election Invite Voters Voters Ballot Result Ballots Vote Ballot Voter Name Voter Email Email of the Voter Name of the Voter Add Voter Swipe to delete Voter Swipe to delete Candidate\'s Name Enter Details of Voters Winner Name Please Write Your Answer Here Security Question Welcome, %1$s! What is your Mother\'s maiden name?
What is the name of your first pet?
What is your nickname?
Which elementary school did you attend?
What is your hometown?
//profile fragment labels Email : UserName : First Name : Last Name : Update Profile Password Cannot Be Empty Passwords Not Matching new password cannot be same as old password password changed successfully Token expired, please login again!
